content: format pdf document of 9 pages with detailed instructions and images illustrating the process skill level easy finished size if done with super fine and fine or light yarn and 1 3 mm hook it s sitting 9 8 25cm tall materials 1 yarn weight fingering or super fine yarn white black for brows 2 suitable hook to yarn 3 fiberfill 4 yarn or tapestry needle 5 white and blue felt for the eyes and black or you can take paints on fabric 6 wire important all rounds are worked in a continuous spiral unless instructed otherwise use a stitchmarker for counting your rounds if you prefer to sew parts together leave a long tail after you finish off i think the toy looks neater if you sew with a finer yarn for example a seperate piece of thread from the yarn you crocheted with it is easier if you add your fiberfill to all the pieces as you are crocheting them
